tldr: Affected versions of this package may inadvertently expose sensitive information due to `Locale`-dependent exceptions in the use of `String.toLowerCase()` and `String.toUpperCase()`. These exceptions can cause unintended columns to be queried, potentially leaking data that should remain protected.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `org.springframework.ldap:spring-ldap-core` library to a patch version.
